property.name: worker.exec.threads
property.description: worker execute thread number to limit task instances

property.name: worker.heartbeat.interval
property.description: worker heartbeat interval, the unit is second

property.name: worker.max.cpuload.avg
property.description: worker max cpuload avg, only higher than the system cpu load average, worker server can be dispatched tasks. default value -1: the number of cpu cores * 2

property.name: worker.reserved.memory
property.description: worker reserved memory, only lower than system available memory, worker server can be dispatched tasks. default value 0.3, the unit is G

property.name: worker.groups
property.description: default worker groups separated by comma, like 'worker.groups=default,test'
